challengeWinners(uint256,address[]).details: A potential winner, who is not claimed as one of winners, is able to challenge the auction

claimWinners(uint256,address[]).details: The auction asker claims winners for the auction

finalizeBid(uint256).details: finalize the bid for the acution for bidders, who are not winning the auction, or asker fails to finalize the auction before finalizeEnd

params._celerValue: potential celer value for bidding, it can be larger than actual celer value
params._hash: hash based on desired rate, value, celerValue and salt

revealBid(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint25.details: Reveal the bid of current user for an auction

params._commitmentsIds: a list of commitments Id for bidding
params._salt: a random value used for hash
